name: Intro
body: You enter a tavern and find an old man at the bar. He says to you: “Welcome, traveler! If you’re going to stay here in town, you need to get a job. But first we need to find out more about you so you can find the best job for you.”

name: Professional Summary
body: “What is so special about you anyway? Tell me about yourself.”

name: Reaction 1
body: “Sounds good enough. But we need to see what you’re actually good at.”

name: Skills 1
body: “What kind of abilities and skills have you developed in your experiences? How will you survive out there?”

name: Reaction 2
body: “Not bad. We could probably find something for you.”

name: Job Title 1
body: “What kind of work experience have you had out in the wastes? Have you been a hired gun, a caravan guard, or a trader? Can you fix broken tech?”

name: Work Dates 1
body: “How long were you doing that for?”

name: Work Tasks 1
body: “What kind of challenges have you faced doing that? Have you had to deal with raiders, mutants, or radscorpions?”

name: More Work 1
body: “Is that it? Or have you done anything else?”

name: More Work 2
body: “Is that it? Or have you done anything else?”

name: Reaction 3
body: “Sounds like you had some interesting times. Let’s find out how smart you are.”

name: School 1
body: “Did you attend the prestigious vault-tec university or learn on the job as a wasteland scavenger? Where did you go?”

name: Degree 1
body: “What kinds of things did you learn?”

name: Reaction 4
body: “You might be pretty smart! We will have to find you something really good.”

name: Accomplishments
body: “What are some of your proudest accomplishments out in the wasteland? Have you defeated a legendary deathclaw, uncovered hidden caches of valuable loot, or successfully negotiated a peace treaty between rival factions?”

name: Finale
body: “Okay we can work with this. You’re ready to start work. It's dangerous to go alone! Take this.”
